long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access the world's 1st inspiration network. Find your rabbit hole. Connect with content in a new way—by the people, for the people. 

The Copus Chrome extension helps you access a new layer of content. Simply click on the Fractopus icon as you browse the internet to break free of big corporation’s algorithms.

The inspiration network is hosted on Copus.io, where creators reference other’s content as inspiration sources. By sharing earnings to increase viewer exposure, everyone benefits!

Features:
✅Follow the flow of inspiration: Track where your favorite content pulled from (sources)! Or, discover how the content is inspiring others (branches)!
✅Use anywhere on the web: Creators can tag any URL as an inspiration source with Copus.
✅Trust the next click: Sources and branches are hand picked by humans, not algorithms.
✅Only charges $0.01 when you earn: Copus is a public good. Attain quick and simple access to the inspiration network.
✅Decentralized and democratic: Built on blockchain technology and with users driving exposure, Copus is truly for the people.
